Introduction

If you've never heard of the Intuitive Widget Gizmo before, you've been left out! It is one of the best products on the market at doing just about anything you want it to.

In fact, it could do so much we had to remove some features from the base version to make more money on premium versions!

This isn't what you think it is, those developers stole our term from us. Our widget can do literally anything!
